tables.name: _staff
tables.description: CORE TABLE: A table storing project hours, including regular and overtime, project details, dates, and additional information for efficient management.

columns.name: hours
columns.description: the hours added for a project of a staff for specific date

columns.name: overTime
columns.description: these are also hours but overtime hours.

columns.name: AH
columns.description: Accumulated hours = hours+ (overTime *1.5)

columns.name: mProjectType
columns.description: duplicate value, same like projectType in the project table

columns.name: date
columns.description: the date for which data is added. do calculations on it instead of created_at.

columns.name: currentDay
columns.description: only for front end

columns.name: projectTitle
columns.description: duplicate value

tables.name: staffs
tables.description: A table storing member details, including names, emails, active status, and associated colors for management and organization purposes.

columns.name: status
columns.description: 1 = active memeber, 0= passive member. Don't have much concern for calculations. It is only used to hide some temporary staff from some listings

columns.name: color
columns.description: hexadecimal value

tables.name: project
tables.description: CORE TABLE: A table storing project details, including title, type, manager, status, dates, and financial information for efficient project management.

columns.name: parentId
columns.description: if project is re-opened as deficiency it will create a new entry in the table and this new project will have parenntId of its parent project. So this entry will not a 'project' it will be 'deficiency'

columns.name: projectType
columns.description: It will has following types: 1.Project, 2. Deficiency 3. Meeting, 4. Shop, 5. Other. 'Project' is the main type here. 'Deficiency' is a kind of child project. The rest of 3 are also called as green entries because these entries has nothing to do with the income/revenue, these are added to keep track of hours only that staff spent how much time on these non revenue entries.

columns.name: PM
columns.description: project manager id, any of staff can be a project manager

columns.name: type
columns.description: it will have id of the type, reference to types table

columns.name: BH
columns.description: budgeted hours for the project

columns.name: desc
columns.description: description

columns.name: completedWeek
columns.description: the week in which project is completed, it will be null for open(active) project

columns.name: completed_at
columns.description: date of completion of the project, it will be null for the open project

columns.name: status
columns.description: Open/completed

columns.name: payStatus
columns.description: There will be two statuses Unpaid/Paid. Currently working on it and  it will be removed from the project table and new table  will be created for it. For now, please ignore this field.

columns.name: hasLR
columns.description: boolean value, if it its false/0 then we this project will not include in the calculations of the LR (labour Rate)

columns.name: cost
columns.description: cost is the amount spent for the 'deficiency', for the project it will remain 0

columns.name: defi
columns.description: id of the defi

columns.name: estimator
columns.description: id of the staff who did the estimation for the project

columns.name: addition
columns.description: If an active project receives additional requirements from the client, the 'price' of the project will not be changed. Instead, a JSON array will be added, containing the title of the addition and the price of each additional item.

columns.name: comp
columns.description: id of the complication

tables.name: breakeven
tables.description: This table will be used to calculate the monthly cost.

tables.name: complications
tables.description: This will be used in the deficiency project. There will be one reason/complication due to which project is reopened as deficiency.

tables.name: defis
tables.description: Same like complication, there will be one defi also if project is opened as deficiency.
